

### `r country17Full[thiscountry]`

```{r, dpi = 300,fig.width=6,fig.height=3.5}
g <- readRDS(paste0("../../temp_docx/forecast_reg_cou_wg_cl_",country17Full[thiscountry],".rds"))
grid.arrange(g+ 
               guides(colour = guide_legend("TAC in West Greenland (T)", ncol = 2))+
               theme(legend.position = "right"))
```


```{r, dpi = 300,fig.width=6,fig.height=3.5}
g <- readRDS(paste0("../../temp_docx/forecast_reg_cou_wg_prop2sw_",country17Full[thiscountry],".rds"))
g$data <- filter(g$data, year >= 1970+year_end)
grid.arrange(g+ 
               guides(colour = guide_legend("TAC in West Greenland (T)", ncol = 2))+
               theme(legend.position = "right"))
```
